data.name: Performance Guarantee
data.description: Free up working capital with IMB’s Performance Guarantee. We can provide a contract retention or lease bond through our Performance Guarantee to free up your working capital for business operations. This is secured by property mortgage or funds held on deposit.

features.additionalInfo: IMB boasts an extensive branch network throughout the Illawarra, Sydney, NSW South Coast, the ACT and Melbourne.
IMB consultants are available Monday to Friday 8am - 8pm and Saturday 9am - 4pm

constraints.additionalInfo: Higher amounts may be considered on an individual basis

eligibility.additionalInfo: Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply

fees.name: Fees and charges apply.
fees.additionalInfo: Lending criteria, terms and conditions, fees and charges apply to a Performance Guarantee. A full list of fees and charges will be provided on application.
